Lipsus Kasak Kusuk Detektif Swasta
Jalani Profesi Berbahaya, Kehidupan Detektif Swasta pun Misterius
03 Nov 2019, 09:22 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Ilustrasi: Edi Wahyono

Jakarta - Mungkin tidak banyak yang tahu bahwa detektif swasta bukan hanya ada di film saja. Pekerjaan di bidang jasa itu benar-benar ada yang menjalankannya di Indonesia.Untuk menemukan para penyedia jasa detektif swasta cukup sebenarnya cukup mudah. Sebab mereka kini juga mulai menawarkan jasanya di media sosial seperti Facebook dan Instagram.Habibi misalnya, dia sudah menjalani profesinya sebagai detektif swasta sejak 2014. Sudah 2 tahun belakangan ini dia menjalaninya dengan sangat serius. Kebanyakan kasus yang ditanganinya adalah perselingkuhan.Dia membentuk tim, mulai dari tim yang terjun di lapangan, tim khusus IT yang mem-back up melalui jejaring internet bahkan untuk meretas sebuah sistem keamanan, hingga tim marketing untuk promosi jasanya.Mereka menawarkan jasanya hanya melalui media sosial. Selain melalui Facebook dia juga membuat akun instagram detektifperselingkuhan_. Di setiap akun medsosnya dia mencantumkan nomor kontak 082337995207."Itu nomor kantor khusus buat klien aja, itu nomor juga hanya bisa dihubungi Whatsapp, tidak bisa ditelepon. Ya kita nggak sembarangan cantumkan nomor telepon," ujarnya saat dihubungi detikcom.Layaknya seorang detektif, Habibi sangat merahasiakan identitas dirinya dan tim. Bisa jadi juga, nama yang dia perkenalkan kepada detikcom merupakan nama palsu.Sikap defensif yang berlebih itu bukan tanpa alasan. Sebab bisa jadi target yang pernah dibuntuti sakit hati dan ingin balas dendam. Habibi bahkan menyembunyikan identitas pekerjaannya dari orang sekitar."Hanya keluarga dan teman yang benar-benar dekat yang tahu profesi saya. Karena memang risikonya besar kalau banyak yang tahu," tambahnya.(das/toy)

Lipsus Kasak buzz Detective Private
Live a dangerous profession, the life of a private detective is also mysterious
03 Nov 2019, 09:22 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Illustration: Edi Wahyono

Jakarta - Maybe not many people know that private investigators aren't just in movies. There are actually jobs in the service sector that run it in Indonesia. To find private detective service providers is actually quite easy. Because they are now also starting to offer his services on social media like Facebook and Instagram. Habibi for example, he has been undergoing his profession as a private investigator since 2014. For the past 2 years he has taken it very seriously. Most of the cases he handled were infidelity. He formed a team, starting from the team that plunged in the field, a special IT team that backed up through the internet network even to hack a security system, to the marketing team for the promotion of their services. They offered his services only through the media social. In addition to Facebook, he also creates an Instagram account for detective cheating. In each of his social media accounts he put contact number 082337995207. "That's just a special office number for clients, that's also a number that Whatsapp can only call, it can't be called. Yes, we don't carelessly include a telephone number," he said when contacted by AFP. Like a detective, Habibi very secretive about himself and the team. It could also be, the name that he introduced to AFP is a fake name. Excessive defensive attitude is not without reason. Because it could be a target that has been trailed by a heartache and wants revenge. Habibi even hid his work identity from those around him. "Only family and friends who are really close know my profession. Because it's a big risk if many people know," he added. (Das / toy)
